issues.description: The solution's Farm class declares the collection of animals as a Set<Animal> (backed by a HashSet) rather than the List<Animal> (backed by an ArrayList) explicitly required by the problem statement. This mismatch in data structure could confuse students and contradicts the instructional guidance.
issues.suggested_fix: Modify the solutionâ€™s Farm class to use a List<Animal> for the animals field and initialize it with an ArrayList. Update the getter and setter signatures and the constructor accordingly to align with the problem specification.
